tweet: We help people who are facing forclosure to save their credit, stay in their homes longer, and become aware of other options.
Good morning every one.  It looks like a great day in Denver.  Looking forward to amazing things today.
2.8 million U.S. properties received foreclosure notices in 2009, whew!
Foreclosures in 2009 were up 21 percent from 2008 and up 120 percent from 2007.
If you are facing foreclosure, there ARE solutions and you don't have to face it alone.  DM me asap.
